IdleWatch

IdleWatch's goal is simple: Provide entertainment while being afk.
IdleWatch let's you spectate other players once execute /afk.
This plugin is aimed for close-nitted communities where leaking coordinates is not an issue and streamers that want to show content while taking a small break.

Features

  • Spectate other players
  • Switch spectating targets every few seconds
  • AFK Timer
